"While hydroxychloroquine is currently the subject of many clinical trials, including one in which Cleveland Clinic is participating, results are inconclusive so far. But despite the president’s comments, Cleveland Clinic experts recommend against using it." #CoronavirusUSA https://t.co/BTUQF824tj
